overview_of_class: The course explores classical and modern philosophies of education using text interpretation, analysis of ideas and argument construction. Philosophies are applied to educational issues. Students develop their own philosophy of education in the course. Course participants prepare for and lead discussion about philosophical works.
name: Problems in the Philosophy of Education
title: SESP TEACH_ED 313-0-20 Problems in the Philosophy of Education
